document_data.caption: A map showing the Rough Road and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Rough Road
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rough Road''' was a street that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Rough Road was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on [[Diamond Street]] just east of the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]]. The Rough Road branched southeast then turned due east at the junction with [[Feather Street]], eventually ending on [[Shield Street]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. Other roads crossing the Rough Road included [[Mendever Street]], [[Cloaksweep Alley]], and [[Sul Street]].
